events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because the size I received doesn’t fit at all.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you received.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and still in its original packaging, I haven’t worn it yet.
Thank you for the info! We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket at no cost.
Great, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label. Looking forward to completing the return smoothly.
Your refund request has been processed and the return label sent via email. Please ship the jacket within 7 days to complete the refund.
Just checking in to confirm that you’ve returned the jacket and to see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I shipped it two days ago using the label provided. Thank you again for the smooth process!
Thanks for confirming. We have now closed your case. Please reach out if you need anything else in the future!
We’ve sent you a short survey to rate your customer support experience. Your feedback is very important to us.
